articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Gambian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Gambian President
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Yaya A. J. J. Jammeh, president of the Republic of Gambia, on Feb. 12 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of its independence.
					 Over the past 50 years since the independence, Gambia has achieved many successes in the work for the stability of the country and its economic development thanks to the positive efforts of the president and people of Gambia, the message said.
					
					 It sincerely hoped that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger and the president and people of Gambia would register greater successes in the efforts to build a prospering new society.

articles.title: Ice Sculptures Displayed on Mansu Hill
articles.content:
Ice Sculptures Displayed on Mansu Hill
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Conspicuous ice sculptures are displayed on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il and the lunar New Year, drawing attention of people.
					 The ice sculptures depicting the Generalissimo star and the Supreme Commander flag reflect the deep yearning and reverence of all service personnel and people across the country for Kim Jong Il who is alive as the sun of Songun of Juche, and their firm will to successfully carry forward and accomplish his cause under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The creators of the Art Studio of the Korean People's Army displayed ice sculptures at festivals at the foot of Mt. Paektu every year. In order to show Pyongyangites ice sculptures, they made the Generalissimo star and the Supreme Commander flag with 6 ton-weighing ice they extracted in the Samjiyon area.
					
					 Pyongyangites talked about the ice sculptures and had pictures taken before them, feeling the freshness of the holy land of the sun where Jong Il Peak stands.

articles.title: Figure-Skating Festival Closes
articles.content:
Figure-Skating Festival Closes
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- A figure-skating festival closed at the Ice Rink Tuesday. It opened to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present at the closing ceremony were Choe Ryong Hae, Yang Hyong Sop, Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin, officials concerned, sports persons and working people.
					
					 Festival cups were awarded to players who displayed high skills.
					
					 Minister of Physical Culture and Sports Kim Yong Hun made a closing address.
					
					 Then a demonstration performance was given.

articles.title: Monument Praising Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Monument Praising Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- In the area of Jongbaek, Rangnang District, Pyongyang, there is a monument bearing the august names of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					 Inscribed on it are letters reading "Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the great leaders of the Korean people who received the highest orders and honorary titles from the 'Protectors of Arts for the Century'". 
					
					 The "Protectors of Arts for the Century", an international charity fund in Russia, built this monument in praise of the great leaders' feats on April 15, 2007.
					
					 Jon Mi Hwa, a citizen living in Jongbaek-dong No. 1, Rangnang District who visited the monument on the Day of the Shining Star, the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il, told KCNA that the monument made the Korean people deeply feel how great their leaders are.
					
					 At the ceremony of unveiling the monument, the president of Russia's International Charity Fund "Protectors of Arts for the Century" said it was erected to praise the undying feats Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed for the development of the DPRK-Russia friendly relations and the humankind. Such monuments carrying their august names were built in cities of Russia and would be erected in different parts of the world, he added.
					
					 Before the monument there are ten red marbles showing that similar monuments were erected in Moscow and other cities of Russia.

articles.title: DPRK Citizens' Yearning for Kim Jong Il Grows Deeper
articles.content:
DPRK Citizens' Yearning for Kim Jong Il Grows Deeper
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The Korean people's yearning for leader Kim Jong Il is growing deeper on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star, his birthday (February 16). 
					 Citizens from all walks of life in the DPRK, including schoolchildren, visit the statues of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the mosaics picturing their smiling images in different parts of the country.
					
					 Ri Ji Song, a student of Pyongyang Secondary School No. 1, told KCNA that he badly missed Generalissimo Kim Jong Il who had spared nothing for the schoolchildren, protecting their happiness.
					
					 Kim Hyon Hui, a member of the fine art group at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, said that Kim Jong Il is alive in the hearts of the schoolchildren as their eternal sun. 
					
					 Ju Yu Gyong, vice-principal of the Hero Haean Senior Secondary School in Wonsan City, said that Generalissimo Kim Jong Il's warm love for posterity continues under the guidance of the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un. And she hardened her will to strive for training the students to be dependable pillars of prosperous Korea, true to the noble intention of the peerlessly great persons.

articles.title: Korea's Synchronized Swimming Has Great Development
articles.content:
Korea's Synchronized Swimming Has Great Development
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- There took place synchronizing swimming performance on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The synchronized swimming that performed on the occasion of the 54th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il in February, Juche 85 (1996) has strikingly manifested the development of the Korean synchronized swimming through more than 70 demonstration performances on significant holidays.
					
					 The demonstration performances reflective of the deep reverence for President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk have been praised by the Korean people year after year.
					
					 They are associated with the big efforts made by coaches and performers who successfully portrayed the feelings of all the people to hold the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu forever in high esteem with elegant rhythms, beautiful formations and high skills.
					
					 Coaches have made untiring pursuit and displayed enthusiasm to put rhythms on perfect formative art after setting a goal of steadily innovating Korean-style synchronized swimming techniques.
					
					 A great number of scientific training methods have been studied and introduced to raise the players' techniques and physical abilities.
					
					 As a result, the number of change of formations has increased more from the previous 20 with the introduction of artistic skills and depiction, making it possible to highly praise the great persons.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Denounces War Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Denounces War Drill 
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea held a press conference outside the puppet Institute for National Defense Studies on Feb. 11 to denounce the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean authorities for staging a drill for operating extended deterrence means aimed at mounting a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK.
					 At the press conference the organization said the drill is aimed to work out an operation plan to mount a preemptive attack on the nuclear weapons and missiles of the north with all the U.S. missile defense systems on the basis of the package missile reaction operation conception.
					
					 If the operation plan is worked out, it will be hard to evade a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula, it noted.
					
					 The new operation plan is little short of making it a fait accompli to inveigle the missile defense system of south Korea into the U.S. missile defense system, it charged.
					
					 It demanded an immediate halt to the drill.

articles.title: Korea Will Glorify This Year as Year of Victory: Koreans' Body in Germany
articles.content:
Korea Will Glorify This Year as Year of Victory: Koreans' Body in Germany
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany posted an editorial titled "Prospect of north's development in 2015 and analysis of situation for national reunification" on Feb. 1 on its website.
					 2015 is a very significant year for the north as it will mark the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea, the editorial said, and went on:
					
					 First Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Un in his New Year address called upon the people to display the revolutionary spirit and mettle of Paektu to scathingly thwart the challenges and maneuvers by hostile forces and score a signal success in the struggle to defend socialism and on all fronts of building a thriving nation and thus celebrate the 70th anniversaries of national liberation and the founding of the Party as revolutionary, auspicious events.
					
					 The Korean people are determined to become the honorable victors in the general offensive for defending the dignity of the socialist country and achieving prosperity by dint of ideology and arms, science and technology in the revolutionary spirit and mettle of Paektu.
					
					 The Korean people out in hearty response to Kim Jong Un's New Year address will glorify this significant year, the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and the founding of the WPK, as a year of great victory, a year of the revolutionary, auspicious events.
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his New Year address set forth "Let the whole nation join efforts to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification in this year of the 70th anniversary of national liberation!", the fighting slogan the entire Korean nation should put up, and indicated the tasks to be carried out in the movement for national reunification this year.
					
					 The editorial said that all the Koreans hope that an epochal occasion for national reunification would be provided this year marking the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Brazilian Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Brazilian Organization on Its Website
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The detailed gist of Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Expedite the Construction of the Livestock Breeding Base in the Sepho Area and Bring about a New Turn in Developing Animal Husbandry" was posted by the Brazilian committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il on its website on February 8.
					 The work, made public on January 28, indicates tasks and ways to be fulfilled in expediting the construction of the livestock breeding base in the Sepho area and bring about a new turn in developing animal husbandry.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreigners
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks took place in different countries on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They were held by the Polish Communist Party, the Federal Republic of Germany-DPRK Association, the Syrian Trade Unions Federation, the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association, an Ethiopian enterprise and the Ethiopian Gabriel Hospital between February 8 and 11.
					
					 The chairman of the Executive Committee of the Warsaw Regional Committee of the Polish Communist Party and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il for developing and enriching the Juche idea as the guiding idea in the era of independence, smashing the moves of the imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK with his Songun politics and setting a shining example in the socialist construction.
					
					 The chairman of the Federal Republic of Germany-DPRK Association said that Kim Jong Il firmly consolidated the defence capacity and defended socialism of the DPRK, holding aloft the banner of Songun in the most difficult period.
					
					 The president of the Syrian Trade Unions Federation said that the Syrian people would always remember the invariable support and encouragement sent by Kim Jong Il to the just cause of the Arab people.
					
					 The manager of an Ethiopian enterprise praised Kim Jong Il for turning the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power through his energetic field guidance.
					
					 The vice director of the Ethiopian Gabriel Hospital said that Kim Jong Il vigorously advanced the socialist cause under the unfurled banner of Songun when the U.S. imperialists and their following forces were trumpeting about the "complete end of socialism", adding his exploits will shine forever.

articles.title: Bulletins Published by Guinean, Mexican Organizations
articles.content:
Bulletins Published by Guinean, Mexican Organizations
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Guinean and Mexican organizations published bulletins on February 10 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Guinean Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association edited an article titled "Birth of Kimjongilia".
					
					 The article said that Mototeru Kamo, a horticulturist of Japan, named the beautiful and marvelous flower which he bred through laborious research and efforts for more than 20 years Kimjongilia and presented it to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The article went on:
					
					 The flower takes after the personality Kim Jong Il as a great man, a significance and value of Kimjongilia as a flower.
					
					 Kimjongilia is, indeed, the flower of the great man in the true sense of the word, which is remarkable from its color to its leaves and stems.
					
					 The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea carried an article introducing Mt. Paektu, the sacred mountain of the Korean revolution, under the title of "Comrade Kim Jong Il and Mt. Paektu".

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Marked by Communist Party of Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Marked by Communist Party of Italy
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of Italy released a statement on February 12 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Communist Party of Italy is greeting the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il as an auspicious holiday.
					
					 Availing ourselves of this opportunity, we are looking back upon the great man's outstanding ideological and theoretical exploits for developing the Juche idea and socialism and his great feats for safeguarding the sovereignty of the DPRK, achieving its prosperity and winning the anti-imperialist struggle.
					
					 The Communist Party of Italy expresses the feelings of friendship and solidarity for the fraternal Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: DPRK Book, Photo Exhibitions Held in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
DPRK Book, Photo Exhibitions Held in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- DPRK book and photo exhibitions took place in the Czech Republic, Uganda and Nigeria between February 7 and 10 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venues of the exhibitions were photos showing revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Exhibited there were their works, and books and photos introducing successes made by the service personnel and people of the DPRK in building a thriving socialist nation and the time-honored history and tradition of the Korean nation.
					
					 The first vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Czech and Moravia said that the exhibition will help visitors have better understanding of the exploits Kim Jong Il performed for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence and successes made by the Korean people in the struggle for building a thriving socialist nation and improving the people's standard of living under the leadership of Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the cause of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The acting chairperson and the acting executive secretary of the Ugandan National Women's Council and other speakers lauded Kim Jong Il as a world political elder who devoted all his life to the Korean revolution, the cause of socialism and the cause of global independence and a peerless strategist who turned socialist Korea into an invincible political and military power through his Songun revolutionary leadership.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente gambiano
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente gambiano
Pyongyang, 17 de febrero (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 12 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Gambia, Yaya A. J. J. Jammeh, con motivo del 50o aniversario de la independencia de ese pais africano. 
					En la misiva el remitente senalo que gracias a los ingentes esfuerzos del mandatario y pueblo gambianos, este pais ha logrado durante 50 anos muchos exitos en las labores para la estabilidad y el desarrollo economico del pais. 
					
					Y deseo de todo corazon el mayor desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises y mayores exitos en los esfuerzos del mandatario y pueblo de Gambia por construir una nueva sociedad prospera.

articles.title: Clausurado Festival de Patinaje Artistico sobre Hielo por Dia de Estrella Luz
articles.content:
Clausurado Festival de Patinaje Artistico sobre Hielo por Dia de Estrella Luz
Pyongyang, 17 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 17 en el Complejo de Patinaje bajo Techo la ceremonia de clausura del Festival de Patinaje Artistico sobre el Hielo en celebracion del Dia de la Estrella Luz.
					Participaron Choe Ryong Hae, Yang Hyong Sop, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin, los funcionarios interesados, los deportistas y los trabajadores. 
					
					En la ceremonia fueron otorgadas las copas del festival a los jugadores que mostraron las habilidades. 
					
					El ministro de Deportes, Kim Yong Hun, pronuncio la palabra de clausura.  
					
					Acto seguido, hubo la presentacion modelo de patinaderos.

articles.title: Clausurada competencia deportiva de funcionarios de organos centrales
articles.content:
Clausurada competencia deportiva de funcionarios de organos centrales
Pyongyang, 17 de febrero (ACNC) -- Quedo clausurada la 20a competencia deportiva por el Premio Paektusan de los funcionarios de los organos centrales.
					En el certamen, efectuado dividido en 4 grupos, el Comite Estatal de Planificacion, el Banco de Comercio Exterior, la Direccion Kumgang y la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea salieron ganadores en la clasificacion general de los grupos.
					
					El Ministerio del Ferrocarril, el Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, la Direccion Taehung y la ACNC lograron primer lugar respectivamente en la lucha de cuerda.
					
					El Ministerio de Industria Extractiva, el Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, la Direccion Kumgang y el Museo de la Revolucion Coreana obtuvieron medallas de oro en el voleibol femenino.
					
					El Ministerio de Agricultura, la Direccion General de Servicios al Pueblo, la Direccion Kumgang y la Academia de Ciencias Sociales salieron ganadores en la competencia de disparo; el Comite Estatal de Planificacion, el Ministerio de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero, la Direccion Unha y las Ediciones en Lenguas Extranjeras, en Taekwondo; el Ministerio del Ferrocarril, el Comite de Educacion, la Direccion Taesong y la Editora del periodico Minju Joson, en el baloncesto y el Ministerio de Industria Ligera, el Banco de Comercio Exterior, la Direccion Myohyang y el Instituto de Estudio de los Asuntos Internacionales, en ping pong. 
					
					La ceremonia clausural tuvo lugar la vispera en el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang.
